code: /** @format */import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{selectIngredients}from"../../slices/input.slice";import{ListGroup}from"react-bootstrap";import ListItem from"../list-item/list-item.component";import{ListContainer}from"./list.styles";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var List=function List(){var ingredients=useSelector(selectIngredients);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListContainer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{variant:"flush",children:ingredients.map(function(ingredient,idx){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{ingredient:ingredient},idx);})})});};export default List;
